r.s: Build (create) and fetch vCard 2.1 and 3.0 text blocks.
r.d:
Allows you to programmatically create a vCard, version 2.1 or 3.0, and fetch the vCard text.
Users of Contact_Vcard_Build are encouraged to check out File_IMC.
r.n: * added unit test for vcard with emails * added unit test for john doe * addressed bug #15348 (added unit-test) * release with package.xml 2.0
